title: Fruit Recognition System for Calorie Detection
description: AI system using computer vision to recognize fruit types and automatically calculate calorie content, supporting dieters and athletes in nutrition tracking.

title: Phong Vu E-commerce Mobile Application
description: Mobile e-commerce application built with Flutter for Phong Vu retail chain. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing and order management.

title: Student Management Application
description: Mobile application for managing student information at educational learning centers. Includes student management, class schedules, grades and notifications.

title: Automated Attendance Security Camera System
description: Research and development of camera-based system using facial recognition for automatic student attendance tracking, integrated with notification management system.
